26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_STACK_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_STACK_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include "configuration.h"
31 #include "memory/MemoryAllocator.h"
32 
33 namespace reactphysics3d {
34 
35 // Class Stack
40 template<typename T, uint capacity>
41 class Stack {
42 
43  private:
44 
45  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
46 
48  MemoryAllocator& mAllocator;
49 
51  T mInitArray[capacity];
52 
54  T* mElements;
55 
57  uint mNbElements;
58 
60  uint mNbAllocatedElements;
61 
62  public:
63 
64  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
65 
67  Stack(MemoryAllocator& allocator)
68  :mAllocator(allocator), mElements(mInitArray), mNbElements(0), mNbAllocatedElements(capacity) {
69 
70  }
71 
73  ~Stack() {
74 
75  // If elements have been allocated on the heap
76  if (mInitArray != mElements) {
77 
78  // Release the memory allocated on the heap
79  mAllocator.release(mElements, mNbAllocatedElements * sizeof(T));
80  }
81  }
82 
84  void push(const T& element);
85 
87  T pop();
88 
90  uint getNbElements() const;
91 
92 };
93 
94 // Push an element into the stack
95 template<typename T, uint capacity>
96 inline void Stack<T, capacity>::push(const T& element) {
97 
98  // If we need to allocate more elements
99  if (mNbElements == mNbAllocatedElements) {
100  T* oldElements = mElements;
101  uint oldNbAllocatedElements = mNbAllocatedElements;
102  mNbAllocatedElements *= 2;
103  mElements = static_cast<T*>(mAllocator.allocate(mNbAllocatedElements * sizeof(T)));
104  assert(mElements);
105  memcpy(mElements, oldElements, mNbElements * sizeof(T));
106  if (oldElements != mInitArray) {
107  mAllocator.release(oldElements, oldNbAllocatedElements * sizeof(T));
108  }
109  }
110 
111  mElements[mNbElements] = element;
112  mNbElements++;
113 }
114 
115 // Pop an element from the stack (remove it from the stack and return it)
116 template<typename T, uint capacity>
117 inline T Stack<T, capacity>::pop() {
118  assert(mNbElements > 0);
119  mNbElements--;
120  return mElements[mNbElements];
121 }
122 
123 // Return the number of elments in the stack
124 template<typename T, uint capacity>
125 inline uint Stack<T, capacity>::getNbElements() const {
126  return mNbElements;
127 }
128 
129 }
130 
131 #endif
